transcript: I was the vice editor of the newspaper I was the editor-in-chief of the literary magazine I got a writing scholarship going into college like I've been writing a long time the books are my absolute long game the amount of guys that I see every single day that stopped me were like dude I'm 21 I'm doing 70 grand a month and you're on my vision board as soon as I cross a million dollars in profit I'm hitting you up it's my longest game which is why I spend so much time on them because if they're not going to be good enough to still be referred to and sold in a decade there's no point in me writing it today
